supportPages.title: Start a FaceTime Call
supportPages.subtitle: Start a video or audio call using FaceTime with a friend, family member or business partner.

supportPages.title: Open Navi
supportPages.subtitle: While staying on the call, return to your homescreen and open Navi.

supportPages.title: Enable Subtitles
supportPages.subtitle: Tap the "Enable Subtitles" button to invite the other people on the FaceTime call to Navi.

supportPages.title: Wait for others to join
supportPages.subtitle: The other people on the call will get a popup telling them to enable Shareplay, after which they can tap on "Open".

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.text: Navi can translate incoming subtitles into the following languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chinese, Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Korean, Kurdish, Kyrgyz, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar, Nepali, Norwegian, Nyanja, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Scots, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba and Zulu.

items.title: Privacy Policy
items.text: You can read Navi's Privacy Policy [here](https://jordibruin.notion.site/Privacy-Policy-7eee44fb47c24a719d89a380bce6aa06)
